full_summary:
==================

### Tender Title

* English: Groceries - Nunavut
* Français: Produits d'épicerie - Nunavut

### Government Reference Number

* GRC Reference Number: PW-STN-201-5581
* Solicitation Number: W1568-220199/A

### Procurement Overview

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Joint Task Force North, and the Canadian Armed Forces, is seeking a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of miscellaneous groceries to kitchens in the Nunavut Territories.

### Procurement Details

* Tender Type: Competitive Bid
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid
* Period of the Standing Offer: From the date of issuance to October 31, 2025, with two one-year option periods.
* Delivery Date: As requested

### Eligibility

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The tender is subject to the Directive on Government Contracts, Including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area.

### Contact Information

* Name: Rina Marsland
* Telephone: (306) 241-5742
* Fax: (418) 566-6167
* Email: rina.marsland@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

### Additional Information

* The tender description and contract documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Canada's free trade agreements do not prevent the inclusion of measures to reserve markets for Indigenous peoples and businesses in procurement.

### Attachment

The following documents are attached:

* Appendix B-1 Evaluation W1568-220199 Nunavut Groceries (Excel)
* Appendix B Mark-up bilingual W1568-220199 Nunavut Groceries (Excel)

### Response

To be eligible to submit a bid, suppliers must ensure they meet all requirements in the tender document. Interested suppliers should review all documents carefully before submitting their bid.

### Sourcing Number

W1568-220199/A
